selections.name: Saveur
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from Metropolitan grade (Canterbury/Randwick). Finished 2nd last start in a strong form race. Trained by Chris Waller and looks perfectly placed to break maiden status here.

selections.name: Tulong
selections.reason: Consistent performer who has placed in 3 of last 4 starts. Just missed at Ipswich last time out and draws perfectly to get a soft run.

selections.name: Magic Snitzel
selections.reason: Showed improvement to finish 5th at Eagle Farm last start. Draws well and should be competitive in this field.

selections.name: Verbalize
selections.reason: Fair effort when 5th at Rockhampton. Needs to overcome the wide draw but has some ability.

danger_horse.name: Tulong
danger_horse.reason: Knocking on the door and will capitalize if the top pick underperforms.

selections.name: Boss Mode
selections.reason: Standout form reference with a 2nd at Eagle Farm last start. Tony Gollan stable is firing. Despite the wide draw, he has the early speed to cross or sit wide and still win against this field.

selections.name: Precise Torque
selections.reason: Solid 2nd at Rockhampton last start. Strips fitter third-up and draws well.

selections.name: Yeah Buddy
selections.reason: Consistent type who wasn't far away at Warwick. Place claims.

selections.name: Blue White Blue
selections.reason: Faded late at Eagle Farm but will find this easier. Inside draw helps.

danger_horse.name: Precise Torque
danger_horse.reason: Improving with racing and maps to get a lovely run.

selections.name: Cool Moon
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd at Eagle Farm last start. Drawn the rails and brings the strongest form lines into this race.

selections.name: Emphatique
selections.reason: Solid 3rd at Sunshine Coast last outing. Improving filly who should be in the finish.

selections.name: Shown The Door
selections.reason: Placed on the Poly track last start. Draws well and can transition that form to turf.

selections.name: Chayse 'N' Bodhi
selections.reason: Emergency runner who showed promise with a 3rd at Ipswich two starts back.

danger_horse.name: Emphatique
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and hitting the line well.

selections.name: Mr O'reilly
selections.reason: Racing well in better grade. 4th at Doomben last start suggests he is ready to peak here. Good draw.

selections.name: Capital Asset
selections.reason: Another dropping from Metro grade (4th at Doomben). Consistent type who handles the distance.

selections.name: Living Free
selections.reason: Last start winner at Eagle Farm. Carries weight but has the class edge.

selections.name: Kipling's Journey
selections.reason: Faded late at Doomben but drops in grade. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Capital Asset
danger_horse.reason: Proven performer at this level and maps well.

selections.name: Will It Snow
selections.reason: Last start winner at the Gold Coast Poly. In winning form and draws ideally to repeat the dose.

selections.name: Tajawal
selections.reason: Placed at Eagle Farm last start. The class runner of the field but has to overcome a wide gate.

selections.name: Down Under Stunnah
selections.reason: Chased hard for 2nd at Doomben. Distance suits.

selections.name: Champagne Rouge
selections.reason: Consistent type who rarely runs a bad race. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Tajawal
danger_horse.reason: If he overcomes the draw, his class will carry him a long way.

selections.name: Eye Of The Eagle
selections.reason: Resuming. Has superior class figures and trialled well. Drawn to get a perfect run.

selections.name: Bews
selections.reason: Runner-up at Sunshine Coast last start. Fit and firing. Major threat.

selections.name: Stanislaus
selections.reason: Consistent galloper who is always around the mark. 3rd last start.

selections.name: Jungle Law
selections.reason: Better than last start suggests. Can surprise at odds.

danger_horse.name: Bews
danger_horse.reason: Hard fit and racing in great heart.

selections.name: Elysium
selections.reason: Resuming. Won on debut and has trialled nicely. Looks to have plenty of upside.

selections.name: Save The Roses
selections.reason: Last start winner at Beaudesert. Confidence is up.

selections.name: Yeah Copy
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 2nd last start. Drawn the rail.

selections.name: Minto's Prince
selections.reason: Fitter for recent racing. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Save The Roses
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is good form, despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Heavenly Impact
selections.reason: Strong 3rd at Doomben last start. Form is superior to most here. Barrier is the concern but has time to find a spot.

selections.name: Rock The Sunrise
selections.reason: Resuming. Has good fresh stats and draws the inside.

selections.name: Vorkuta
selections.reason: Last start winner at Ipswich. Emergency who gains a run and must be respected.

selections.name: Watermelon
selections.reason: 2nd at Gold Coast Poly. Consistent and draws well.

danger_horse.name: Rock The Sunrise
danger_horse.reason: Fresh and drawn barrier 1, could be hard to catch.
